issue.title: [Docs] PyArrow docs missing Feather documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1520](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1520). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Feather documentation seems to be missing from the PyArrow documentation site:

https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/search.html?q=feather&check_keywords=yes&area=default

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1520?focusedCommentId=16160566) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Duplicate of ARROW-1307. It's not missing – none has been written! Documentation patches would be very welcome

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1520?focusedCommentId=16160567) by Rares Vernica (rvernica):*
I meant that the doc strings from Python files don't show up on the site.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1520?focusedCommentId=16160574) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Right, someone has to add them to https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/python/doc/source/api.rst. I was planning to do it tonight since it's in the 0.7.0 release milestone

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1520?focusedCommentId=16160576) by Rares Vernica (rvernica):*
Got it, I just did it. See PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1084
